title: Machine Learning in JS
subtitle: Creating your first machine learning script in Javascript
author: Joel Lord
abstract: Machine learning can seem like a complex subject but really, it's easy to get started.  See how you can create your first machine learning script in Javascript.

title: Intro to SystemJs
subtitle: The Universal Loader That Lets You Use ES6 Modules
author: Joel Lord
abstract: I stumbled on SystemJs today.  It seems very interesting to include modules using the ES6 format so I gave it a try and here are some of my findings.

title: The Node Event Loop
subtitle: Coffee shops and the Node event loop
author: Joel Lord
abstract: The Node event loop is the core concept behind Node's performance.  Here is a little metaphor that will hopefully help you understand a little bit more about it.

title: Using Clusters
subtitle: Unleashing the full power of multi threads
author: Joel Lord
abstract: Node is typically single threaded, but using the cluster module, you can spin off many instances of your application.

title: Array methods you should be using
subtitle: For a cleaner and more readable code base
author: Joel Lord
abstract: There are some built-in array methods that you should always be using instead of for loops to write cleaner code.

title: Upgrading Node with n
subtitle: Using n as a Node binary management tool
author: Joel Lord
abstract: How to use n to manage and upgrade your current version of node.

title: Command Line Tools with Node
subtitle: Run your NodeJs scripts as a command line tool
author: Joel Lord
abstract: How to easily create command line tools using NodeJs.

title: WordPress moves to Javascript
subtitle: Javascript everything !
author: Joel Lord
abstract: WordPress is migrating to a Javascript interface, so what?.

title: Creating Node Modules
subtitle: Part 4 - Publishing
author: Joel Lord
abstract: Now that you have all the pieces ready, let's publish it.

title: Creating Node Modules
subtitle: Part 3 - Testing
author: Joel Lord
abstract: Before we publish this module, let's add some tests to it.

title: My speaking goals for '16
subtitle: It's not a real goal until you write it down
author: Joel Lord
abstract: As the year end is approaching, I am setting myself some personal speaking goals.

title: Creating Node Modules

abstract: Second part of the series, focusing on the package.json file generation.

title: Creating Node Modules
